title: OfBusiness | SDE -2  | Gurugram
content:
Education: B.Tech(Computer Science)
Years of Experience: 2.3
Prior Experience: SDE-1 at PBC
Date of the Offer: Jan 2024
Company: OfBusiness
Title/Level: Software Engineer 2
Location: Gurugram
Salary: 14 LPA
Relocation: 50K
Joining Bonus: 50K 
Stock bonus: 4 Lakhs (20%, 20%, 30%, 30%)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ 19 LPA
Benefits: 30 paid leaves, Medical Insurance above CTC

title: Microsoft | SDE 2 / L61 | Noida (remote)
content:
Education: Tier 2
Years of Experience: 3.2
Prior Experience: Amazon SDE 1
Current :  21.4+  3.2 (joining) + 1.5 (every year stocks)

Date of the Offer: Jan 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L61
Location: Noida (remote)
Salary: Base 29 LPA 
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0 
Stock bonus: 80K USD (Over 4 years / after 1 year  6.25%  vested every 3 months )
Bonus: 0-20 % 
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):  29 + 16.60 + 3 (taking 10 % as perf) = 48.6 LPA
Benefits: Whatever microsoft offers

Interview Exp : https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/4509857/microsoft-l61-sde-2-offer-accepted/2232873
